description: This file contains the HTML structure, CSS styles, and JavaScript logic for a Database Viewer web application, allowing users to browse and interact with connected databases and their tables.

classes.name: DatabaseViewer
classes.description: A web application interface for viewing and interacting with databases.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Loads the list of databases from the API and updates the UI.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and updates the UI status.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles the visibility of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads the tables for a selected database and displays them in the UI.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays the data for a selected table from a database.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates and displays the HTML for the data table.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders an individual cell in the data table with appropriate formatting.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Handles expansion and display of full content for a table cell.
